title: Looking for this old Letraset font
content:
Hi all. Thanks for your help. I'm so wishing I had one of my old Letraset catalogues around, but I thought I'd never need them. Here's the font I'm seeking:

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [agadvantage.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20110515104238/http:/typophile.com/files/agadvantage.jpg) | 38.99 KB |
author: tea and toast

comments.content: [Revue](http://web.archive.org/web/20110515104238/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/revue/), looks like it's been artificially slanted.
Thanks so much! I sure appreciate your help, raph and Bendy!
